text: Alaha hi hai, jisa ne tuhanu paida kita hai, phira usa ne tuhanu rizaka pradana kita, phira uha tuhanu mauta dida hai. Phira uha tuhanu jivita karega, ki tuhade (ghare) sarikam vicom vi ko'i ajiha hai, jihara inham vicom ko'i kama karada hai. Uha, unham de kite siraka tom bihatara ate pavitara hai
